item.title: Kalderetang Manok
item.description: Classic Filipino dish, great paired with freshly cooked rice and a bottle of Coca Cola. ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 30 min. üç≥ Cook time: 1 hr. üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 5 Ingredients 1 lb of chicken 2 chopped potatoes 2 chopped carrots 1 chopped onion 2 chopped cloves of garlic 1 chopped tomato (optional) 3 cups of water Tomato sauce Chopped bell pepper Dried peas Liver spread Fish sauce Grated cheese Directions Saut√© onions, garlic and (optional) tomato, in a pan of olive oil.

item.title: Ginataang Kalabasa
item.description: Or “Squash in Coconut Milk”. This is a common Filipino dish. ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 10 min üç≥ Cook time: 30 min üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 8 Ingredients One medium sized squash that is easy to peel (butternut squash is usually best) Two cans of coconut milk One onion A few cloves of garlic Directions Remove the seeds from your squash, then peel it and chop it up into large cubes, then set aside.
